summary: This bill, the Countering White Supremacist Extremism Act, directs the Under Secretary for Intelligence and Analysis of the Department of Homeland Security to develop a threat assessment regarding foreign violent white supremacist extremist organizations. This assessment will be shared with various entities, including state, local, and Tribal law enforcement, and, upon request, with online platforms to assist in identifying content violating terms of service. The bill defines relevant terms and includes a limitation to protect lawful political discourse.
